document_data.mainbody:
he Iron Bull Smithy was blacksmith shop in Ravens Bluff, during the mid-14 century DR, that specialized as the citys farrier. It was run by the siblings Smith, a brother and sister, whose work was of the utmost quality. They provided the finest horseshoes, and took great care when shoeing their clients steeds. 
Originally located on Anvil Alley in the Holyhouses neighborhood, the Iron Bull was relocated to the corner of MacIntyre Path and Skulls Street within Swordspoint due to the construction of a temple.
